activation.condition: When you jump or fall more than 10 feet

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

As a reaction when you jump or fall more than 10 feet, you can treat gravity as if it were 1 step lower until the end of your next round. You ignore penalties from the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.QnGpBSHSTiszjPSb]{Off-Kilter} condition for the duration. If you spend a Resolve Point, you can treat gravity as if it were 2 steps lower, and this effect lasts for 1 minute. Once you’ve used this ability, you can’t use it again until you spend 1 RP to regain Stamina Points after a 10-minute rest.
